summary: This is an email from an Assistant United States Attorney in the Southern District of New York inquiring about the timing for receiving copies of images from Jeffrey Epstein's devices seized during searches in New York and the Virgin Islands. It demonstrates ongoing investigative activity after Epstein's death.

persons.name: Assistant United States Attorney
persons.context: The author of the email, inquiring about evidence from Epstein devices seized in New York and the Virgin Islands.

events.title: Seizure of Epstein Devices
events.description: Devices belonging to Jeffrey Epstein were seized during searches conducted in New York and the Virgin Islands.

keyFacts: An Assistant U.S. Attorney was actively seeking evidence from Epstein's devices as of October 2020.
The evidence (images) came from devices seized during searches in New York and the Virgin Islands.
The correspondence indicates the investigation into Epstein's activities was ongoing after his death.
The email is a direct request for timing on when the prosecutor's office would receive the evidence.
